Reference

Package

trekcolors-package trekcolors

trekcolors: Star Trek Color Palettes

Datasets

trekpals

Star Trek color palettes.

Functions

trek_pal() view_trek_pals()

Star Trek color palettes

scale_color_trek() scale_fill_trek()

Color and fill scale functions for Star Trek palettes

lcars_pals() lcars_pal() lcars_colors_pal()

Palettes and palette generating functions based on LCARS colors

lcars_colors() lcars_2357() lcars_2369() lcars_2375() lcars_2379()

Hex colors from LCARS color names

scale_color_lcars() scale_color_lcars1() scale_color_lcars2() scale_fill_lcars() scale_fill_lcars1() scale_fill_lcars2()

Color and fill scale functions for LCARS colors
